# Getting Started



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, readxl, SmartEDA, easystats, gtsummary)
```
:::


# Importing Data



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
car_resale <- read_excel("data/ToyotaCorolla - Copy.xls")
head(car_resale)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
